name: HACK UP
description:
Welcome Syndicate Agent! HACK UP to the root node with your fast-typing hacker skills while avoiding the network's defenses.

Made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2023

[ARROW KEYS] to move
[SPACE] to begin hacking nearby nodes
[MASH ANY KEYS] (excluding arrow keys) to write your hacking code

David Snopek: Programming/Visuals
Logan Lang: Programming/Visuals
Will Poppen: Sound Design
With Gameplay Design assistance from Elliot Christenson and Logan Dalke
